query:
Question: All of the following contain metric units of measurement except

Choices:
A: g, kg, cg
B: dL, L, mL
C: ft, yd, mi
D: N, J, W
steps: Identify the units of measurement in each choice to see if they are metric or not.
Choice A contains g (grams), kg (kilograms), and cg (centigrams), which are all metric units.
Choice B contains dL (deciliters), L (liters), and mL (milliliters), which are also all metric units.
Choice C contains ft (feet), yd (yards), and mi (miles), which are not metric units; they are imperial units.
Choice D contains N (newtons), J (joules), and W (watts), which are all metric units of measurement.
